data.name: SILENT DOOM
data.detailed_description:
SILENT DOOM is an atmospheric first-person horror adventure set in a nightmarish universe. Gameplay consists of combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving. The objective of the player is to guide main protagonist through a monster-filled world as he searches for answers of what is happening.

It is designed around the idea of "being thrown into the world". Isolated and lost inside this dream-like world.
Every location contains its own theme (story), puzzles and characters that are integral in creating a cohesive world. Throughout the game you will open up new areas, acquire different skills of survival, weapons, various items and try to comprehend the sights presented to you.

data.short_description: SILENT DOOM is an atmospheric first-person horror adventure set in a nightmarish universe. Gameplay consists of combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving. The objective of the player is to guide main protagonist through a monster-filled world as he searches for answers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of violence, some hinted at suggestive themes, and frequent scary imagery.
